I like this game. The levels are difficult, but not too hard. You feel like a genius every time you complete one. The story and lore are also great. Valve really outdid themselves on this one.

Definitely one of the best games of all time, PERIOD! It's a very good puzzle game, like its predecessor, but the story and overall presentation is where it shines. For the price I paid, SGD3/USD2.20 for both game, it's almost robbery

Epic game. Got it at christmas time one year and played for three hours straight. Voice chat is iffy and hard to turn off but otherwise a solid game. Good puzzles too, challenging.
I really enjoy the stimulation and how it makes you think differently. I think it has an amazing story and really deserves a try.
